website_summaries.verdict: A classic pair of goggles that are comfortable and look great.
pros: These basic goggles work well and will last
Lenses also resist scratches and impacts
Triple-layer face foam fleece wicks away sweat
For a smaller, non-spherical design, these are a great choice
cons: Clear lens means no UV protection

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Very clear lens. But allow too much air in and dries out my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: They are comfortable to wear, haven't fogged up yet and the lens is made evenly where my vision isn't skewed. Cons: I think they allow way too much air in and my eyes dry out after just a short ride. My eyeballs almost feel like they are freezing when I wear these in winter. I guess the air is supposed to help prevent the lens from fogging. The only other con is that I can't stop seeing the little plastic pieces on the sides that I believe are supposed to support the tear-aways.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Ski Goggles for night skiing
customer_reviews.text: These goggles feature clear lenses and are good for night skiing. I had some other off brand ski goggles that were OK, but they were too dark and had to much tint for night skiing. For the money, definitely worth it. Be sure to place the goggles on your face BEFORE you start skiing/snowboarding and keep them on, do not take them off or goggles will fog up. It also helps if goggles are anywhere from normal room temp up to body heat (72° F - 98°F) before wearing them. If the goggles are cold when put on face... they will fog up.
customer_reviews.author: BFM90

customer_reviews.title: Nice Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use when I am riding my ATV. They have a very nice tint to them. It really helps on the bright sunny days; tones everything down so I don't have to squint. They are even well suited for the cloudy overcast days as the tint is not too strong. They work well with a full face helmet. Although once I had the lens pop out when stretching them on to the chin of my helmet; a small inconvenience that only took a moment to correct. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Crumbz

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I would say here is they are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I would say here is they are a little tall for use with Bike helmets, so I ahve to wear my helmet in a less comfortable/safe position while using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a new set of clear lensed goggles for night riding. I was going to buy a cheap pair but went with my gut and bought a new pair of Oakley's. I have always had Oakley goggles for riding. I forgot how soft and nice the foams are on a brand new set. These should last me another 15 years, just like my old Oakley googles did. Spend the money, buy the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Keeps the Dust Out of Eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Oakley’s! Really keeps the road dust down for more enjoyable rides! Comfortable, too. Got another pair for the Love of My Life. He loves his, too! Comes in a nice sleeve used for cleaning lense.
customer_reviews.author: LadyOtheLake

customer_reviews.title: Secure, comfortable, don’t fog.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product for the price. I use these with on a KLR650 with a 3/4 helmet. They stay secure on the helmet, don’t fog, and rest comfortably on my face. There ya go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Thought these where going to be a good buy, as I own lots of Oakley products, but they plastic is so thin and flimsy, like covering your face with Saran Wrap
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Tooley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Skiing Goggles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for skiing... AMAZING for the price. These babies fit comfortably and absolutely NO FOGGING UP. Very impressed. I originally was a little hesitant since they are categorized as MX goggles (Motorcross sports), but for the price I decided to give them a try. I skied with these in Snow, Rain, Sun, Clouds.... They are fantastic! Never had a single complaint about them. They fit great, have great vision, I even like the lens's. I've always used the amber lens's but these were great, even in cloudy weather. Would HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: RobStringG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These goggles work well, although after riding my motorcycle and sweating a bit, the foam tends to become a little scratchy. The tinted lenses work well during the day, but they are not so dark that you have to remove them at night. All in all good product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: phurst

customer_reviews.title: Works well for bicycling
customer_reviews.text: Fits PERFECTLY with my bicycle helmet. Outstanding quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use while riding my JetSki. Let me tell you they work amazing, super awesome. They don’t fog up and there is enough ventilation so it’s not hot and sticky. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on the chance that it would keep the pollen out of my wife's eyes while riding her bike. The pollen gets under her contacts causing severe pain and loss of vision. She reports problem solved, and beautiful clear vision as well. A little discomfort around the nose, but well worth the initial mild discomfort. Used them once to weedeater trim and got them pretty nasty with sticky vegetation but removed the lens, cleaned it, and it was as good as new
customer_reviews.author: Vilonia

customer_reviews.title: good for skiing
customer_reviews.text: despite being way cheaper than other types of snow goggles, these work really well. I have skied with them in Colorado for 4 years. they never fog
customer_reviews.author: whodawhatbeeatindachikin

customer_reviews.title: Work nicely for riding a four-wheeler
customer_reviews.text: My husband really like these for riding on his four wheeler. He said they fit nicely and keep the wind and dirt out of his eyes.
customer_reviews.author: VHM

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy another brand!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are the best. So in love with the idea that I can keep the goggles and just buy a new lens! I bought this pair for my daughter and am buying a pair for me now! My husband has had his for more than 15 years!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great entry or mid-range googles for mtb or mx but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great entry or mid-range googles for mtb or mx but you might want to get tinted lenses because if you scratch a clear lens its way easier to see it. But over all there great.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Really nice goggles
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift, nicely packaged and recipient was very satisfied. They are definitely very attractive and work very well (Used primarily for four-wheeling and occasionally skiing. Comfortable fit even after several hours. Lens seem to resist scratches but definitely worth taking care of them when storing them.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Freaking sweet. A little small on the face for actual full size adults, but great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These seemed like youth size, did not fit well inside an adult MX helmet.
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than advertised but feel like genuine Oakley.. Good value for youth at the price. Not very good for adult motocross helmet. Good for adults watching races I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Senpai

customer_reviews.title: OK Goggles
customer_reviews.text: I used these for snow skiing. They worked fine, but they pinched my nose a little more than other goggles I have worn, which made it difficult to breathe through my nose. They are too small to fit glasses in as well. I ended up giving these to my son and I used my old goggles. My son complained about having trouble breathing through his nose as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, but the lenses are brittle, crack and scratch easily and the straps warp and stretch after a couple of months of being soaked in perspiration and grime.
customer_reviews.author: shrifty

customer_reviews.title: The "O" is not the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much. It's light, with good vision. Comfortable! But the "O" printed on the strap is not the same as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Love my goggles! Can't go wrong with any type of Oakley eye-wear. They are especially a good buy since you can change the lens when it gets nicked up... and I've already changed mine once. The replacement lenses only cost about 10 dollars, and you can buy different shades if you wish. I highly recommend these goggles!
customer_reviews.author: mustang guy

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best goggles I've worn that do not fog
customer_reviews.text: Got these goggles for airsoft. Perhaps the best goggles I've worn that do not fog.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Not super dust/sand tight
customer_reviews.text: They are advertised for off road but they have very thin foam around the goggles so sand and especially dust still get in. obviously better then sunglasses or nothing but not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks different on my face than what I expected, Kind of small for my face.
customer_reviews.author: airtightj

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for hard enduro and light DH
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for hard enduro and light DH, there are some options for the lenses, I like the iridium fire for summer, and for winter, the clear ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Can’t go wrong w Oakley.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these to mow the fall leaves in the evenings and keep dust out of his eyes. He’s very happy w the product.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Used sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Used googles sold as new, the box was ripped/torn and dirty with fingerprints all over the lens.
customer_reviews.author: The Buster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ended up putting the orange lens in these. It makes cloudy days sunny.
customer_reviews.author: xnewyorkhardcorex

customer_reviews.title: Not for Adult Sized Bodies
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these. They are supposedly made for adults, but the inside cushion left way too small of an opening for my adult-sized son. Had to return them. Would be great value for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-of-JOPA

customer_reviews.title: Fit comfortably. Lense tint is best for sunny days
customer_reviews.text: Very clear lenses. I tested them skiing and with a helmet. Never fogged up. Fit comfortably. Lense tint is best for sunny days. I wore them in sunny and flat light conditions. In flat light (lots of shadow) Amber lenses are probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Julio A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite goggles and is really comfortable around the face
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: High quality without the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these thinking that they were specifically made for skiing as they were under "ski goggles" but they are motocross goggles. This did not effect anything at all. The quality is there and they are yet to fog up in the coldest conditions. If you want a name brand goggle without the price and recieve the same quality, get these goggles!
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaSlayer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad BUT The Goggles Were A Little Small
customer_reviews.text: These MX Goggles are really nice looking and are made from great materials. Just what I expected from Oakley. Lenses in other goggles are hard and do not bend well with the goggles like these Oakley O-Frame goggles do. My only complaint is that the goggles look and feel small on your face (Almost like a youth size goggle).
customer_reviews.author: Aus10TX

customer_reviews.title: Great quality goggles at a great price.  Marketed for MotoX, but work great for the snow sports!
customer_reviews.text: Used these goggles my first time skiing and they were awesome. Reduced the glare from the snow, never fogged up and were incredibly comfortable. I'd definitely buy these again if I had to, or recommend them to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for riding my atv. Awesome look well made and does not fog up. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Nice but they are small
customer_reviews.text: Its a good goggle but I got them for my dirt bike helmet and they were too small, so I had to get a different pair. The low stars are my fault not the sellers
customer_reviews.author: Adam Green

customer_reviews.title: these are the most comfortable goggles I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: these are the most comfortable goggles I ever bought. and they perform like they should they are oakleys, very happy would buy them again. thanks to everybody j.honda
customer_reviews.author: j.honda.

customer_reviews.title: Great for it's price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this ski as a flex item for my brother. Actually it looks really cool, but idk is it good for an active sport :)
customer_reviews.author: Josh Brann

customer_reviews.title: Oakley O-Frame goggles for over glasses
customer_reviews.text: very good product for price a lot cheaper than in stores. I bought this for my wife she wears glasses and these fit over them. one draw back is if you have big frames its tough to wear because the glasses hit the inside lens and it wears marks in them.
customer_reviews.author: devans64

customer_reviews.title: ... gloomy day in Oregon and couldn't have asked for better goggles haha
customer_reviews.text: Went snowboarding on a gloomy day in Oregon and couldn't have asked for better goggles haha.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Jakob

customer_reviews.title: YUP!
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Great quality, good price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Winsome To Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these goggles as a birthday gift, the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these goggles as a birthday gift, the arrived on time. However, they were a bit small for a 20 something male to wear over a helmet. Another downside is that they are clear lenses, which I didn’t think about, but that’s not the products fault. The only thing I would say is for them to clarify the strap size a little more on here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goggles
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a charm and super cheap for Oakley brand
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Carrere

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Very fog resistant and fits like a second face. Very comfortable even for all day use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Provides ample eye protection. We bought replacement tinted lenses to give more sun protection. Fun blue design on glasses can be unisex. Great quality and no complaints. Great price here at Amazon for both items.
customer_reviews.author: MyPenNameTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It's actually pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's actually pretty good for the price. I have a fat face so it kinda runs small but if you order the right size it would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Duldulao

customer_reviews.title: He used to ride pro and is used to having the best gear. Recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these goggles. He used to ride pro and is used to having the best gear. Recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: AnaAndreaXoxo

customer_reviews.title: Worth price
customer_reviews.text: I use these motocross goggles for snowboarding and they just worked great. No fog at all. I put them in my bag without a protection and there is no scratch as it's advertised to feature scratch resistant. A great quality with this price.
customer_reviews.author: FUFY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These googles are awesome. Just what I needed to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Gig

customer_reviews.title: A little cheap, but very happy over all.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little flimsy, they are made out of like rubber rather then a plastic. But they fit very well, and the lenses are replaces so they can double up as snowboarding goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I expected it to be because of the brand's reputation. I was not disappointed. It was hard for me to find a decent price on goggles with a clear lens. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Rockenstyre

customer_reviews.title: My glasses fit comfortably underneath, and only fog up when I'm waiting ...
customer_reviews.text: My glasses fit comfortably underneath, and only fog up when I'm waiting at lights. The goggles themselves don't fog up at all. The goggles have an excellent field of view, and have proven to be satisfyingly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's NOT polarized, and the snow and/or direct sunlight will likely blind user Otherwise, it's as described/expected
customer_reviews.author: Ezzy

customer_reviews.title: a bit small for me, but acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: for big head like mine its a little small and clear lenses are not allways good, otherwise ok, i gues it should be 10buks cheaper. i dont ride often so for me it's still acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goggles
customer_reviews.text: I used them on a ski trip with a -14 wind chill and it worked perfect. Keeps the eyes warm, great visibility and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Totally a good fit, easy to exchange lens during a ride assessment, and or on the trail. breath nicely and don't fog up at all, comfortable on the face and nose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Novak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fitment for my fat head! -- Not anti fog.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fits my fat head. However, they are not truly anti fog. I am beginning to believe there is no such thing.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Ketchin

customer_reviews.title: Great for night skiing/snowboarding!
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear goggles that I can use for night snowboarding and still able to see clearly day or night. Nice comfort fit and quality.
customer_reviews.author: vfallon

customer_reviews.title: Oakley goggles
customer_reviews.text: Works great and blocks all the snow, used for 4 years already
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They're a little pricey but, at least so far, perform flawlessly - light weight, utterly comfortable fit, no fogging even at sub zero temps.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ruhland

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: color and comfort as expected. These gogs have lasted my many months now. That's saying a lot for me. Oakley quality continues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ford

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head, the strap fit around but the lens did not fit my face
customer_reviews.author: Fan12HAWKS

customer_reviews.title: Great in the snow.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Christmas gift for best friend's son. He is into snow boarding so this was a great gift. He enjoyed them during the snowy winter.
customer_reviews.author: bargain hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quality product that usually comes with Oakleys... and in Oakley fashion, they look sharp!
customer_reviews.author: MikeHenderson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They look better than they do on the picture. They are comfortable and seem pretty durable. The Frame is obviously not real carbon fiber, hopefully nobody expects that for $40 though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: The gift was well received and appreciated, The quality of the ski goggles was excellent. The lenses can be replaced it needed.
customer_reviews.author: medixrun

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, these glasses have served me well! I think the clear lenses are great for the travel on the river on a snow machine if the clouds are keeping the direct sunlight from hitting your eyes. Otherwise I would go with the tinted lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D Young

customer_reviews.title: i like
customer_reviews.text: little small for going over motocross helmet but works.i like it
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't look to anyone else for good goggles.
customer_reviews.text: Second pair in seven years. Wouldn't look to anyone else for good goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ATV
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for atving, great cheap goggles, you can never have too many goggles, eventually they will get destroyed.I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: dog812

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: WAY too big of a design. I thought they were smaller
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Oakley quality in a box
customer_reviews.text: Oakley Goggles what's not to like. Well built comfortable, quality product that will last with care. Oakley a great brand and service was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, very comfortable, good air ventilation. Good quality lens. If i break it, i'll buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Work great and look nice
customer_reviews.text: Entry level goggles that are worth the money. I have used these several time while trail riding, mountain riding, and river riding. They held up well in all conditions except for once when it poured on us. It was hard to see out of them and I had to wipe them several times. So I guess they work well in all dry conditions. Still a great set of goggles for the price. I recommend them to anyone on a budget or just getting into riding.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the fine dust out of the eyes and my contacts that regular sunglasses weren't doing! Worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I CRASHED WITH THESE ON AND THEY DIDNT BREAK BEND OR CRACK
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for off road riding. Goggles are very comfortable and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the jet black, and got the jet black goggles with the carbon fiber strap... the goggles are great, just not the look I was going for
customer_reviews.author: Raw7s

customer_reviews.title: Decent goggles
customer_reviews.text: Great price for simple clear goggles. I use them daily for work and they breather nicely.
customer_reviews.author: big250d

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Did not fog up and these goggles look great on the slope. I did not have vision issues and perfect color
customer_reviews.author: Kellye

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the colors! Is flexible and excelent to a motocross helmet! I love this product =)
customer_reviews.author: Las Terrenas TV

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Functional but thin. Overall vendor experience was pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Heisinger

customer_reviews.title: Good googles but quite dark
customer_reviews.text: It is a good google in terms of quality and look. But it does foggy and the lenses are sometime too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to ski right now
customer_reviews.text: I had several goggles however it is better than price strong, light, good shape! I truly recommand that item Buy right now
customer_reviews.author: croad

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: This goggles fit well. Did not have any problem with lens fogging up. Also the lens are easily interchangeable. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kirt Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I simply trust the performance provided by Oakley. Great skiing goggles and they don't fog up easily. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ning Yuan Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good Goggles
customer_reviews.text: I got these goggles for my 11 year old daughter to use while snowmobiling. They have worked great until this past weekend. The inside froze/fogged up while riding making it very hard to see. Thank goodness i had a back up pair for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: chrissycox

customer_reviews.title: Mountain Biker Must!
customer_reviews.text: Great frames! Quality is amazing. Fits full faced mountain bike helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Well made goggles. My only compalint is that the faom around the noze is rather thick and some times tries to pinch my nostrals making it harder to breath.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just a little small fitting. Nice but smaller than I would have likes.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for the
customer_reviews.text: you get what you paid for. pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: NICE goggles for the price...!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten them out in the snow yet as the ski trip isn't here yet but they look great, feel great and should perform great since they're Oaklies...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly V.

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Great frame, good look, great buy. Keeps my face warm and the cold out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F

customer_reviews.title: Great for night skiing
customer_reviews.text: The lens has a peg for attaching peel-offs. Although the configuration is designed for motocross, I use it for night skiing. It fogs a little bit sometimes when I'm stationary. This maybe because it's a single lens. Otherwise, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lee

customer_reviews.title: Still has some fogging issues. I'm going to try ...
customer_reviews.text: Still has some fogging issues. I'm going to try applying an anti-fog spray inside and some rain-x on the outside to increase clarity if it happens to be snowing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise it's a nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Used them primarily for biking in the winter and they were very effective. Felt a little tight around the nose, but otherwise it's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product. The goggles are very comfortable and they were delivered in a timely manner. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Oakley O Frame MX Adult Off-Road Motorcycle Goggles - Jet Black/Clear
product_meta.description:
Color:Jet Black & WhiteSome of the winningest riders in history put their faith in the Oakley O Frame, relying on the moisture-wicking comfort, wide view and impact-resistant lens.

Flexible O Matter frame optimized for comfort,fit and maximized peripheral view
Triple-layer face foam fleece to wick away sweat
Anti-fog,scratch-resistant and impact-resistant Lexan lens
All Iridium lens
feature_bullets: Flexible O Matter frame optimized for comfort,fit and maximized peripheral view
Triple-layer face foam fleece to wick away sweat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars318 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
